professional.intro: Over 30 years of experience in dentistry, specializing in orthodontics and dental aesthetics.

positions.title: Director
positions.description: Leading a team of dental professionals, providing comprehensive orthodontic and aesthetic dental care. Specializing in complex cases and implementing cutting-edge dental technologies.

positions.title: Head of Orthodontics
positions.description: Managed the orthodontics department, treating complex cases and mentoring junior dentists. Introduced new orthodontic techniques and treatment protocols.

positions.title: Associate Dentist
positions.description: Provided general dentistry services while developing expertise in orthodontics and dental aesthetics. Participated in numerous continuing education programs.

achievements: Pioneer in implementing digital orthodontics in Rosario
Regular speaker at national dental conferences
Member of the Argentine Association of Orthodontics
Certified instructor for various orthodontic systems

degrees.title: Diploma in Mollin Technique and Straight Wire

continuousEducation: MBT, Roth and Rickets Orthodontic Techniques
Treatment of retrognathia and promandibulism with Delaire-Verdon mask
Dental implantology applied to orthodontics and periodontics
Fixed and removable prosthetics, systems retained by attachments, posts, magnets and tangential bars
Gingival and periodontal surgery with laser and cautery
Prosthetic rehabilitation on single-phase surgical implants
Treatment of TMJ dysfunction, facial pain and persistent headaches
